LanguageData.VFED_GiveQuest_ChasedDeserter.label: imperial deserter
LanguageData.VFED_ImperialPatrol.label: imperial patrol
LanguageData.VFED_PropagandaDrop.label: imperial propaganda drop
LanguageData.VFED_PropagandaDrop.letterText: Cargo pods are crashing nearby. They seem to contain imperial propaganda, advertising how life under the imperial rule is full of wonders. The leaflets seem to mention a new deserter-reporting system with great rewards. It will take a long time to clean up, and anyone cleaning these leaflets will suffer a mood penalty and lose certainty in their way.
LanguageData.VFED_Raid_Absolver.label: absolver raid
